#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
     int t;
     string a,b;
     scanf("%d",&t);
     while(t--)
     {
     
          cin>>a;
          cin>>b;
          sort(a.begin(),a.end());
          sort(b.begin(),b.end());
          if(a==b)
               cout<<"YES"<<endl;
          else
               cout<<"NO"<<endl;     
     }
     return 0;
}
